Introduction
============
ApraPipes is a pipeline framework.

Design 
^^^^^^
- | Reusable Modules
- | Easy to Test
- | Memory Management
- | Thread Management
- | Parallel Processing 

Stack
^^^^^
- | C++
- | CUDA
- | CMake

Libraries
^^^^^^^^^
- | Boost C++
- | Nvidia 

    - | CudaToolkit
    - | NPPI
    - | NvJPEG
    - | NvENC 
    - | Jetson MultiMedia API
- | Intel Media SDK
- | OpenCV
- | Live555

Core Concepts
^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. image:: Module.jpg


Module
""""""
Base class

Pins
""""
Two modules are connected using pins

Queue
"""""
Blocking, NonBlocking

FrameMetadata
"""""""""""""
Properties of a pin. Width, Height, MemType, FrameType

FrameFactory
""""""""""""
Responsible for reusing memory

Frame
"""""
Data is transported using frame

FrameContainer
""""""""""""""
Has multiple frames

ModuleProps
"""""""""""
fps, Queue Strategy
